question: Saratoga and Yorktown, USA, are the sites of the defeat of which armies?
vanilla_rag_result: Saratoga and Yorktown, USA, are the sites of the defeat of the British Army. At Saratoga, British General John Burgoyne surrendered to American General Horatio Gates, marking a turning point in the American Revolutionary War. At Yorktown, British General Charles Cornwallis surrendered to American and French forces, leading to the end of major combat in the war.
